title: Catherine Zeta Jones shares a heartwarming photo of her and her son Dylan
text:
Catherine Zeta Jones is heading back to college.

On Friday, the 50-year-old actress took to Instagram to share a photo of her and her son Dylan, 19, while visiting him at his college campus.

The two smiled at the camera as she kept a low-profile in a pair of round sunglasses and a scarf while she took a selfie with her son.

College Days: Catherine Zeta Jones smiles with her son Dylan as she visits him at college at Brown University

'On campus with my boy Dylan,' she wrote in the post with the college sophomore.

Dylan attends Brown University, and last year when Catherine and his famous father Michael Douglas, 75, helped him move into the dorm, it appeared to be a tough goodbye.

'Let the lectures really begin! I love you Dylan. Good luck in the next exciting and enlightening chapter of your life,' she wrote along side a black and white video of the teen hanging out in his new dorm room.

Mom and dad: Catherine and Michael Douglas smile for a photo that Catherine shared to Instagram of her and her longtime love

Daredevil: Their son seems to be a bit of a risk-taker as he recently went skydiving as well as cliff jumping while in Sicily

Last week, while on The Ellen Degeneres Show the father of three opened up about how his middle child is a bit of a daredevil.

He opened up about his son went cliff jumping while on their most recent trip to Sicily saying: 'He does all kinds of things like this.'

'He just did a skydiving thing,' Douglas said of his son. 'But I remember that age. It's a hormonal thing, I think, for boys, testing yourself … I just think it — you know, what I did not like is he was the first one to jump.'

Back then: A young Catherine and Michael smile as they pose for a photo while at a dinner party

The two got married back in 2000 after their family friend Danny DeVito introduced them.

They also share their daughter Carys, 16 and Michael has another son from a previous married named Cameron, 40.

Catherine and Michael did have a brief moment where they split up back in 2013 but later reconciled and have been back together ever since.
